definition: burrowing marine mollusk living on sand or mud, to gather clams, by digging in the sand by the ocean
details:
noun
- burrowing marine mollusk living on sand or mud
- flesh of either hard-shell or soft-shell clams
- a piece of paper money worth one dollar
= synonyms: buck
verb
- to gather clams, by digging in the sand by the ocean
= example: to gather clams, by digging in the sand by the ocean
